alert.note: Alert for Robertson; Sumner (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 11:30AM CDT until June 29 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sumner County in Middle Tennessee... Robertson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1215 PM CDT. * At 1129 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Memphis Junction to 6 miles southwest of Russellville, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Springfield, Hendersonville, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Coopertown, Westmoreland, Ridgetop, Cross Plains, Portland, Orlinda, Mitchellville, Bethpage, Oak Grove, Bledsoe Creek State Park, Cottontown and Black Jack. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 102 and 121. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
